Ms. BYNUM. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the impressive  efforts of Kyla Guerrero, a constituent of mine from Bend, Oregon. Kyla  has used her Gold Award Girl Scout project to tackle the issue of food  waste, taking leftover food and repurposing it to sustain a local farm.  I am truly impressed by her innovation and hard work.…
